author: Erin McDowell
ingredients: unsalted butter, vegtable oil, semisweet chocolate, sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, all purpose flour, salt
instructions: "1:Preheat oven to 350 F. Lightly grease a 9x9 inch-pan and line it with parchment paper. Leaving at least 1 inch of overhand on the sides.
column7: 2: In a medium heat safe bowl: combine the butter
column9: and chocolate. Place over a small pot of simmering water and head. Stirring occasionally until the mixture is fully melted and combined.Let cool lightly
column10: 3:Add the sugars to the chocolate mixture and beat well to combine. Add the eggs gradually mixing fully to incoporate before adding the next addition. Beat in the vanilla
column11: 4:Add the flour and salt and mix to combine
column12: beat well to ensure there are no flour pockets
column14: 5: Pour the batter into the prepared pan and bake until moist and clumpy crumbs appear when you insert a toothpick into the center of the brownies
column15: 20 to 25 minutes. Cool completely before slicing."
